item1.name: Corrupting Potion
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item3.name: Noonquiver
item3.description:
30 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
  • Precision: Attacks deal an additional 20 physical damage to Minions and Monsters.

item4.name: Essence Reaver
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item5.name: Plated Steelcaps
item5.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Phase Rush
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

item0.name: Eclipse
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item1.name: Phage
item1.description:
15 Attack Damage
200 Health
  • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore 2% max Health over 6 seconds.

    Restoration reduced to 50% for Ranged users.

item2.name: Plated Steelcaps
item2.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 0 Attack Speed for 8s (90s ).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item1.name: Broken Stopwatch
item1.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item2.name: Plated Steelcaps
item2.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item3.name: Blade of The Ruined King
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
10% Life Steal
  • Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).

    Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

item5.name: The Collector
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Hail of Blades
perk0.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item0.name: Riftmaker
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
8% Omnivamp
  • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

50% Attack Speed
  • Icathian Bite: Attacks apply (15 + 20% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit.

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Divine Sunderer
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

65 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals an additional (60 + 45% bonus Attack Damage) true damage.

20% Critical Strike Chance

  • Deft Strikes: Your critical strikes with Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

item2.description:
20 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Spectral Waltz: Attacks grant Ghosting and 7% Move Speed for 3 seconds. In addition, Attacking 4 times causes Spectral Waltz to also grant 30% Attack Speed for the same duration.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.
